Description: Luxurious modern estate with stunning views, high-end finishes, and a private pool. This 6-bedroom, 5-bathroom home offers spacious living areas and top-of-the-line amenities.
Neighborhood Description: Bel Air is an exclusive neighborhood known for its upscale homes, celebrity residents, and proximity to fine dining and shopping.

Description: Elegant townhouse in historic Georgetown featuring 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, gourmet kitchen, and a charming courtyard. This meticulously designed property exudes sophistication and style.
Neighborhood Description: Georgetown is a picturesque neighborhood with cobblestone streets, upscale boutiques, and renowned dining options. Its rich history and vibrant culture make it a sought-after location.

Description: Stunning modern estate in the prestigious Bel Air neighborhood. This luxurious home features high-end finishes, expansive living spaces, a gourmet kitchen, and lush outdoor areas perfect for entertaining.
Neighborhood Description: Bel Air is known for its exclusive gated communities, celebrity residents, and panoramic views of the city. It offers a tranquil escape from the hustle and bustle of Los Angeles.

Description: Charming brownstone townhouse in the historic Back Bay neighborhood. This elegant home boasts classic architecture, modern amenities, a private courtyard, and easy access to shops and restaurants.
Neighborhood Description: Back Bay is renowned for its Victorian brownstones, upscale boutiques, and iconic landmarks like Newbury Street. It offers a sophisticated urban lifestyle with a touch of old-world charm.

Description: Stunning contemporary mansion with panoramic views of LA. High-end finishes, expansive living areas, state-of-the-art kitchen, and luxurious master suite. Outdoor pool and entertainment deck.
Neighborhood Description: Bel Air is an exclusive neighborhood known for its celebrity residents, upscale shopping, and beautiful hillside estates.

Description: Chic loft-style apartment in the heart of Soho. Open layout, high ceilings, designer finishes, and private terrace. Close to trendy boutiques, art galleries, and gourmet restaurants.
Neighborhood Description: Soho is a vibrant and artistic neighborhood known for its cast-iron architecture, cobblestone streets, and bustling art scene.

Description: Stunning modern home with panoramic views of the Golden Gate Bridge. High-end finishes, gourmet kitchen, and expansive outdoor deck for entertaining.
Neighborhood Description: Pacific Heights is a prestigious neighborhood known for its Victorian architecture, upscale shops, and proximity to parks.

Description: Charming brownstone townhouse with original details, renovated kitchen, and private backyard oasis. Ideal for families or those seeking a peaceful retreat.
Neighborhood Description: Park Slope is a vibrant neighborhood with tree-lined streets, excellent schools, and a diverse culinary scene.
